purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of planned as well as actual outputs from an activity or a task.

ul.li: Definition and quantification of work output;
Relationships between the work output statement and detailed descriptions of the work output item e.g. a product, a serialized item etc;
Classification of work output and work output relationships.

purpose.example: An example of a relationship between work outputs is the relationship between the planned and the actual work output.
purpose.p: The following are not enabled by this module alone but are enabled by modules that use this module:

ul.li: Property, date and descriptive representation assignment;

inscope.li: Definition and quantification of planned as well as recorded work outputs;
Relationships between the work output and detailed descriptions of the output.

outscope.li: Detailed description of the work output;
Descriptions of the activity or task that delivers or produces the output;

uof.name: Work_output
uof.description: The Work output UoF lists the planned and/or actual outputs from an associated activity or task.

aa.refpath_extend: classification_item classification_item *> work_output_classification_item work_output_classification_item work_output_classification_item = action_method
classification_item classification_item *> work_output_classification_item work_output_classification_item work_output_classification_item = action_method_relationship

aa.refpath: action_method characterized_action_definition = action_method characterized_action_definition characterized_action_definition <- action_property.definition action_property [{action_property.name = 'quantity'} {action_property.description = 'work_output_quantity'}] action_property <- action_property_representation.property action_property_representation [{action_property_representation.name = 'quantity'} {action_property_representation.description = 'work_output_quantity'}] action_property_representation.representation -> representation [{representation.context_of_items -> representation_context representation_context.context_identifier = ''} {representation.context_of_items -> representation_context representation_context.context_type = 'work_output'}] representation.items[i] -> representation_item representation_item => value_representation_item value_representation_item.value_component -> measure_value measure_value <- measure_with_unit
